#summary The API (Instance Variables) calls for WebLoginPE.
#labels Phase-Implementation

= LanguageArray =

An array of language specific phrases.

{{{
@var array
@access public
@see __construct()
}}}

= Report =

Holds a message if one was generated.

{{{
@var string
@access public
@see FormatMessage()
}}}

= liHomeId =

A comma separated list of MODx document IDs to attempt to redirect the user to after login.

{{{
@var string
@access public
@see login()
@see LoginHomePage()
}}}

= loHomeId =

The MODx document ID to redirect the user to after logout.

{{{
@var string
@access public
@see logout()
@see LogoutHomePage()
}}}
